paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Patients included 18 with wild-type TTR and 11 with Val122Ile variant; demographics not specified further.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: During the TRACS study, there were 12 patient deaths (Val122Ile: n = 8; wild-type: n = 4).
During the TRACS study, there were 12 patient deaths (Val122Ile: n = 8; wild-type: n = 4).
During the TRACS study, there were 12 patient deaths (Val122Ile: n = 8; wild-type: n = 4).

functional_data.summary: Tafamidis treatment showed significant survival benefit in patients with TTR-CM.

variants.population_frequency: 3% to 4% in African Americans or people of African descent.
variants.additional_notes: The study included both treated and untreated patients.
key_quotes: Patients with either wild-type or Val122Ile genotypes treated with tafamidis have a significantly longer time to death compared with untreated patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted from the main text and included individual-level penetrance data.
